summary: Lao San is a young veteran high in Kungfu power but low in intelligence. After landing on a job as a body guard for a wealthy antique collector, Lao San finds out his boss's plot to rob the National Art Museum.
cast: Ye Liu|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Yong You|Yang Liu|Rongguang Yu|Ellen Chan|Hua Cao|Steven Jiang|Jingwu Ma|Honglei Sun|Otto Wong|Hong-Tao Zheng
keywords: friend|hypoxia|brain damage|deaf|woman shot in the forehead
title: Ying han
